name: 陳金聖
objective: This course concentrates on the analysis, simulation and design of digital control systems using the transfer function and state variable representation. The students will be using the Matlab/Simulink tools to simulate their design and evaluate the performance. In addition, this course also deals with the implementation of digital filters for control applications.
